thread.title: Three 6 Mafia rapper dead at age 40
thread.title_full: Three 6 Mafia rapper dead at age 40

title: Three 6 Mafia rapper dead at age 40
text:
Posted: 7:36 p.m. Saturday, Oct. 10, 2015 Three 6 Mafia rapper dead at age 40 Related Robert Cooper Phillips, better known as Three 6 Mafia rapper Koopsta Knicca, died Oct. 9. He was 40. Photo MyFoxMemphis. More News Headlines MyFoxMemphis 
Memphis rapper Robert Cooper Phillips has died. He was 40.Phillips was best known as “Koopsta Knicca,” a member of Memphis rap group Three 6 Mafia. 
According to his management, Phillips recently suffered an aneurysm and was placed on life support at a Memphis hospital. 
On Thursday, friends said Phillips was still breathing and they were holding out hope he would wake up. 
But early this morning, his death was confirmed. 
To all who are concerned Robert Cooper Phillips AKA KOOPSTA KNICCA has officially left us all,This is a GREAT LOST to... Posted by Koopsta Knicca on Friday, October 9, 2015 
“We will continue to keep him alive with his music,” an administrator said on Phillips' Facebook page . 
Dr. Confirmed With Me That @koopstaknicca36 Passed This Morning at 12:55am. You Will Be Missed My Brother!!! Love U Koop!!! #ripkoopstaknicca
